summary: This document is a financial alert from Deutsche Bank regarding Richard D. Kahn, who was involved in a regulatory action by NYSE Arca for failing to provide requested testimony. The alert indicates that Kahn is permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless he complies with the terms of the decision.

persons.name: Richard D Kahn
persons.context: Richard D. Kahn is mentioned as a respondent in a regulatory action by NYSE Arca for failing to provide testimony as requested by FINRA.

events.title: Regulatory Action Against Richard Kahn
events.description: Richard Kahn was involved in a regulatory action where he violated NYSE Arca Equities Rule 10.2(d) by failing to provide testimony as requested.

keyFacts: Richard D. Kahn was permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless he provides testimony within 120 days.
The regulatory action was taken on April 20, 2012.
The alert was issued on September 3, 2013.
